Description.Text: Suite Paradise offers a wide array of accommodations at some of the finest beach resorts in Kauai. Accommodations range from one bedroom to four bedrooms and offer garden views, ocean views, and ocean front views. As a Suite Paradise guest, you will enjoy the carefree resort lifestyle for which Kauai hotels are known, along with the extra privacy and spaciousness of a vacation condo.The beautiful Poipu Beach area offers an array of activities for everyone in the family. Take a boat tour to explore the hidden treasures of Kauai, like the Na Pali coastline, or a breathtaking helicopter tour that showcases the exotic hidden waterfalls of the island. Visitors can also enjoy kayaking, scuba diving, snorkeling, hiking, surfing, mountain biking, deep-sea fishing, horseback riding, and ATV tours. Golfers can select from local favorites to championship courses, such as Poipu Bay Golf Course. Tennis enthusiasts can choose between soft or hard courts at the tennis center. Please note that there is an extra person fee of USD 10.00 per night, if applicable. Additionally, pack-n-play cribs can be reserved for USD 10.00 per night.

The South Shore of Kauai offers visitors a seemingly infinite number of activities, tours, and dining options. From boat tours to helicopter tours to outdoor sports, Kauai offers plenty of activities for the entire family.

3 bed/2 bath ocean view extra deluxe - These 3 bedroom, 2 bath condos are within easy walking distance to the beach and include a full kitchen, separate living room, dining area, master bedroom, private garden, ocean lanai and laundry area. Resort pools, tennis, and hot tub are also nearby.
4 bed/3 bath garden view extra deluxe - These 4 bedroom, 3 bath condos are within easy walking distance to the beach and include a full kitchen, living room, dining area, master bedroom with bath, private garden view lanai and laundry area. Resort pools, tennis, and hot tub are nearby.
4 bed/3 bath garden view extra deluxe-ac - These 4 bedroom, 3 bath condos are within easy walking distance to the beach and include AC, a full kitchen, living room, dining area, master bedroom with bath, private garden view lanai and laundry area. Resort pools, tennis, and hot tub are nearby.
4 bed/3 bath ocean view extra deluxe - These 4 bedroom, 3 bath condos are within easy walking distance to the beach and include a full kitchen, separate living room, dining area, master bedroom, private ocean view lanai and laundry area. Resort pools, tennis, and hot tub are also nearby.
1 bed/1 bath garden view deluxe - These 1 bedroom, 1 bath condos are located near the resort pool, restaurant, and tennis, a perfect home away from home for cost-conscious vacationers. Unit includes a full kitchen, living room, dining area for 12, surrounding garden, and laundry area.
1 bed/1 bath ocean view deluxe - These 1 bedroom, 1 bath condos are within easy walking distance to the beach and include a full kitchen, separate living room, dining area, master bedroom, bath, private ocean view lanai and laundry area. Resort pools, tennis, and hot tub are also nearby.
2 bed/2 bath garden view deluxe - These 2 bedroom, 2 bath condos are within easy walking distance to the beach and include a full kitchen, separate living room, dining area, master bedroom/bath, private ocean view lanai and laundry area. Resort pools, tennis, and hot tub are also nearby.
2 bed/2 bath ocean view deluxe - These 2 bedroom, 2 bath condos are within easy walking distance to the beach and include a full kitchen, separate living room, dining area, master bedroom, bath, private ocean view lanai and laundry area. Resort pools, tennis, and hot tub are also nearby.
